header.description: Scalar values for the report header. date_from and date_to come from user-supplied parameters. generated_at is injected by the report engine at generation time.

rows.description: One row per gateway from app_gateways. Each row carries name, host, protocol_hint, status, created_at, and updated_at. Optionally filtered by created_at within the reporting period.

totals.description: No totals section in this report.

semantics: date_from and date_to are user-supplied filter parameters that define the reporting period displayed in the header and optionally used to filter rows by created_at. generated_at is a pass-through value injected by the report engine.
transformations: No reshape needed â€” data comes from a single flat table (app_gateways) with no unpivoting.
Format row_created_at and row_updated_at as dd-MM-YYYY HH:mm:ss for display.
Order rows alphabetically by gateway name ascending.
